title: Course Schedule
statement: There are N courses labeled 0 to N-1. Some courses have prerequisites. Given the number of courses and a list of prerequisite pairs, determine if it is possible to finish all courses.
input_format:
First line contains N (number of courses) and P (number of prerequisites).
Next P lines contain two integers A and B meaning course A requires course B as prerequisite.
output_format: Print 'YES' if all courses can be finished, otherwise 'NO'.
